dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 863 RS: To facilitate the addition of park administration at the Coltsville National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
Reported by Ms. Murkowski, without amendment

form.official-title: To facilitate the addition of park administration at the Coltsville National Historical Park, and for other purposes.

section.header: Amendment to Coltsville National Historical Park donation site
section.text: Section 3032(b)(2)(B) of Public Law 113–291 (16 U.S.C. 410qqq) is amended by striking East Armory and inserting Colt Armory Complex.
